item.title: TurnOff.us
item.description: This week I happened to meet a minimalist blog about everyday life and technology, I really liked it and I want to share a post of it here :) See turnoff.us

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Introduction Don’t Repeat Yourself DRY is a good design goal and Hugo does a great job supporting it. Part of the art of a good template is knowing when to add a new template and when to update an existing one. While you’re figuring that out, accept that you’ll be doing some refactoring. Hugo makes that easy and fast, so it’s okay to delay splitting up a template.

item.title: About
item.description: Hey, this is a minimalist blog about devops and things around you, maintained by Renato Ruis. I hope you like it, have fun and collaborate :) Ah! i’m brazilian and i’m practicing my english, please, if there are mistakes help me to improve.
